Description: Ostracon (?), large section of the body of a brown pottery bowl with convex sides and everted rim, the fabric is greyish in section, both the interior and exterior are covered with a brown slip, the exterior is elaborated with one line of Coptic text written in black ink.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394852) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394852)
